replies.msg:
其實食藥唔會特別令你開心啲，只係幫助你腦分泌令你個人唔會諗野負面。頭頭食可能個人會變到好易眼瞓，因為瞓覺可以加多啲你腦分泌。其實如果維持唔長既時間，特別呢啲又濕又唔多太陽既日子，可以去普通醫生開抗抑鬱藥。如果係長期,又對你身體好大影響如失眠、嘔吐、有自殺傾向等，就需要睇專科醫生比較好。

媽咪有情緒病
身邊既人已經用最大既努力去遷就佢
可惜愈遷就 佢就愈過分
基本上 同佢有任何意見不合 或者說話唔岩聽 唔係順佢意 即使係簡單講一句 你鐘意啦 佢唔岩聽就會發脾氣同喊
覺得身邊既人好憎佢 然後就會要生要死
對住佢 屋企所有人既壓力真係好大
佢發脾氣試過打屋企人 例如發嬲個陣試過車自己老公幾巴 或者係咁打佢老公
不過我老豆都好忍佢 係有時放工番黎好攰 自己老婆又發哂癲 真係忍唔住就會拍枱或者係講粗口鬧人
佢有睇開醫生 不過食唔到藥 因為食左藥令佢無精神做唔到野 番唔到工 所以係靠做運動釋放多鈀銨黎令自己開心

由細到大都面對住好多誇張既爭執同打人場面 令到我自己都覺得自己有焦慮症同情緒病
有時出街會諗 媽咪今日會唔會病發 病發個陣老豆會唔會又忍唔住 一諗到就會拿聲番屋企 或者打電話番去睇下點 無事就會安心哂
有時夜晚訓教 諗起好多媽咪打人 或者鬧交既場面 就會失控咁喊

我同身邊任何人講 都無人真正明白我 因為無人經歷過我屋企既事 即使係而家講出黎 我已經忍唔住係咁喊 所以有咩負面情緒我已經無同任何人講

申請左嘅intern仲未有回音
總覺得自己證明緊比counselor知, 我係幾無能, 唔死都冇用
無曬人
有冇人知香港邊到有CODEINE買, 外國隻nurofen plus可以週街買,可以好似唔得
codeine+tramadol+diazepam+flunitrazépam+zopiclone+fentanyl+xanax

佢地(屋企人)又嫌我大聲鬧鳩我

Contraindications

Due to the effects of increased norepinephrine levels and, therefore, higher noradrenergic activity, pre-existing hypertension should be controlled before treatment with SNRIs and blood pressure periodically monitored throughout treatment. Duloxetine has also been associated with cases of hepatic failure and should not be prescribed to patients with chronic alcohol use or liver disease. Patients suffering from coronary artery disease should avoid the use of SNRIs. Furthermore, due to some SNRIs' actions on obesity, patients with major eating disorders such as anorexia nervosa or bulimia should not be prescribed SNRIs.[17] Duloxetine and milnacipran are also contraindicated in patients with uncontrolled narrow-angle glaucoma, as they have been shown to increase incidence of mydriasis.[8][48]

SNRIs should be taken with caution when using St John's wort, as the combination can lead to the potentially fatal serotonin syndrome.[50] There is also a significant risk when combining SNRIs with dextromethorphan, tramadol, cyclobenzaprine, meperidine/pethidine, and propoxyphene. They should never be taken within 24-hours of any other antidepressant, especially with monoamine oxidase inhibitors (MAOIs), as combinations of SNRIs with MAOIs can cause hyperthermia, rigidity, myoclonus, autonomic instability with fluctuating vital signs, and mental status changes that include extreme agitation progressing to delirium and coma.[8]

ISOtretinoin

If you are taking any of these drugs: Demeclocycline, doxycycline, minocycline, tetracycline, a product that has vitamin A in it, a product that is like vitamin A, or St. John's wort.

以上都係我9up 睇法
